word:
A godly jealousy is essential for us all. If the word of God were eaten as the food for the soul, if it were treated with deference and respect, there would be no necessity for the many and repeated Testimonies that are 


                                     -351- 

borne. The simple declarations of Scripture would be received and acted upon.--Letter 127, 1896, pp. 5, 6. (To O. A. Olsen, December 1, 1896.)
